title: Torawareta Amai Kemonotachi
description: Kazuki, the heir to the Todou Group, is graduating from college. Now he has to make a difficult decision: to become the president in order to fulfill Chiharu's wishes, he has to go to America – alone. And Chiharu seems to be okay with that? Can Saiju Chiharu, who has been by his side forever, really let go of his beloved Kazuki...!?
